016package io.micronaut.maven.services;
017
018import org.apache.maven.execution.MavenSession;
019import org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException;
020import org.apache.maven.plugin.logging.Log;
021import org.apache.maven.plugin.logging.SystemStreamLog;
022import org.apache.maven.project.DefaultDependencyResolutionRequest;
023import org.apache.maven.project.DependencyResolutionRequest;
024import org.apache.maven.project.DependencyResolutionResult;
025import org.apache.maven.project.MavenProject;
026import org.apache.maven.project.ProjectDependenciesResolver;
027import org.apache.maven.shared.invoker.InvocationResult;
028import org.apache.maven.shared.invoker.Invoker;
029import org.apache.maven.shared.invoker.MavenInvocationException;
030import org.eclipse.aether.RepositorySystemSession;
031import org.eclipse.aether.graph.Dependency;
032import org.eclipse.aether.graph.DependencyFilter;
033import org.eclipse.aether.util.filter.DependencyFilterUtils;
034
035import javax.inject.Inject;
036import javax.inject.Singleton;
037import java.io.File;
038import java.nio.file.Path;
039import java.util.Collections;
040import java.util.Comparator;
041import java.util.List;
042import java.util.Map;
043import java.util.Optional;
044import java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicReference;
045import java.util.function.Function;
046import java.util.stream.Collectors;
047import java.util.stream.Stream;
048
049/**
050 * Provides methods to compile a Maven project.
051 *
052 * @author Álvaro Sánchez-Mariscal
053 * @since 1.1
054 */
055@Singleton
056public class CompilerService {
057
058    public static final String MAVEN_COMPILER_PLUGIN = "org.apache.maven.plugins:maven-compiler-plugin";
059    public static final String MAVEN_JAR_PLUGIN = "org.apache.maven.plugins:maven-jar-plugin";
060    public static final String MAVEN_RESOURCES_PLUGIN = "org.apache.maven.plugins:maven-resources-plugin";
061    public static final String GMAVEN_PLUS_PLUGIN = "org.codehaus.gmavenplus:gmavenplus-plugin";
062    public static final String KOTLIN_MAVEN_PLUGIN = "org.jetbrains.kotlin:kotlin-maven-plugin";
063
064    private static final String JAVA = "java";
065    private static final String GROOVY = "groovy";
066    private static final String KOTLIN = "kotlin";
067    private static final String COMPILE_GOAL = "compile";
068    private static final String RESOURCES_GOAL = "resources";
069
070    private final Log log;
071    private final Map<String, Path> sourceDirectories;
072    private final MavenProject mavenProject;
073    private final MavenSession mavenSession;
074    private final ExecutorService executorService;
075    private final ProjectDependenciesResolver resolver;
076    private final Invoker invoker;
077
078    @SuppressWarnings("MnInjectionPoints")
079    @Inject
080    public CompilerService(MavenProject mavenProject, MavenSession mavenSession, ExecutorService executorService,
081                           ProjectDependenciesResolver resolver, Invoker invoker) {
082        this.resolver = resolver;
083        this.log = new SystemStreamLog();
084        this.mavenProject = mavenProject;
085        this.mavenSession = mavenSession;
086        this.executorService = executorService;
087        this.sourceDirectories = resolveSourceDirectories();
088        this.invoker = invoker;
089    }
090
091    /**
092     * Compiles the project.
093     * @param copyResources whether to copy resources to the target directory.
094     * @return the last compilation time millis.
095     */
096    public Optional<Long> compileProject(boolean copyResources) {
097        Long lastCompilation = null;
098        if (log.isDebugEnabled()) {
099            log.debug("Compiling the project");
100        }
101        try {
102            if (sourceDirectories.containsKey(GROOVY)) {
103                executorService.executeGoal(GMAVEN_PLUS_PLUGIN, "addSources");
104                executorService.executeGoal(GMAVEN_PLUS_PLUGIN, "generateStubs");
105                if (copyResources) {
106                    executorService.executeGoal(MAVEN_RESOURCES_PLUGIN, RESOURCES_GOAL);
107                }
108                executorService.executeGoal(MAVEN_COMPILER_PLUGIN, COMPILE_GOAL);
109                executorService.executeGoal(GMAVEN_PLUS_PLUGIN, COMPILE_GOAL);
110                executorService.executeGoal(GMAVEN_PLUS_PLUGIN, "removeStubs");
111                lastCompilation = System.currentTimeMillis();
112            }
113            if (sourceDirectories.containsKey(KOTLIN)) {
114                executorService.executeGoal(KOTLIN_MAVEN_PLUGIN, "kapt");
115                if (copyResources) {
116                    executorService.executeGoal(MAVEN_RESOURCES_PLUGIN, RESOURCES_GOAL);
117                }
118                executorService.executeGoal(KOTLIN_MAVEN_PLUGIN, COMPILE_GOAL);
119                executorService.executeGoal(MAVEN_COMPILER_PLUGIN, "compile#java-compile");
120                lastCompilation = System.currentTimeMillis();
121            }
122            if (sourceDirectories.containsKey(JAVA)) {
123                if (copyResources) {
124                    executorService.executeGoal(MAVEN_RESOURCES_PLUGIN, RESOURCES_GOAL);
125                }
126                executorService.executeGoal(MAVEN_COMPILER_PLUGIN, COMPILE_GOAL);
127                lastCompilation = System.currentTimeMillis();
128            }
129        } catch (MojoExecutionException e) {
130            if (log.isErrorEnabled()) {
131                log.error("Error while compiling the project: ", e);
132            }
133        }
134        return Optional.ofNullable(lastCompilation);
135    }
136
137    /**
138     * Resolves the source directories by checking the existence of Java, Groovy or Kotlin sources.
139     *
140     * @return a map with the language as key and the source directory as value.
141     */
142    public Map<String, Path> resolveSourceDirectories() {
143        if (log.isDebugEnabled()) {
144            log.debug("Resolving source directories...");
145        }
146        AtomicReference<String> lang = new AtomicReference<>();
147        Map<String, Path> sourceDirectoriesToResolve = Stream.of(JAVA, GROOVY, KOTLIN)
148                .peek(lang::set)
149                .map(l -> new File(mavenProject.getBasedir(), "src/main/" + l))
150                .filter(File::exists)
151                .peek(f -> {
152                    if (log.isDebugEnabled()) {
153                        log.debug("Found source: " + f.getPath());
154                    }
155                })
156                .map(File::toPath)
157                .collect(Collectors.toMap(path -> lang.get(), Function.identity()));
158        if (sourceDirectoriesToResolve.isEmpty()) {
159            throw new IllegalStateException("Source folders not found for neither Java/Groovy/Kotlin");
160        }
161        return sourceDirectoriesToResolve;
162    }
163
164    /**
165     * Resolves project dependencies for the given scopes.
166     *
167     * @param scopes the scopes to resolve dependencies for.
168     * @return the list of dependencies.
169     */
170    public List<Dependency> resolveDependencies(String... scopes) {
171        try {
172            DependencyFilter filter = DependencyFilterUtils.classpathFilter(scopes);
173            RepositorySystemSession session = mavenSession.getRepositorySession();
174            DependencyResolutionRequest dependencyResolutionRequest = new DefaultDependencyResolutionRequest(mavenProject, session);
175            dependencyResolutionRequest.setResolutionFilter(filter);
176            DependencyResolutionResult result = resolver.resolve(dependencyResolutionRequest);
177            return result.getDependencies();
178        } catch (org.apache.maven.project.DependencyResolutionException e) {
179            if (log.isWarnEnabled()) {
180                log.warn("Error while trying to resolve dependencies for the current project", e);
181            }
182            return Collections.emptyList();
183        }
184    }
185
186    /**
187     * Builds a classpath string for the given dependencies.
188     *
189     * @param dependencies the dependencies to build the classpath for.
190     * @return the classpath string.
191     */
192    public String buildClasspath(List<Dependency> dependencies) {
193        Comparator<Dependency> byGroupId = Comparator.comparing(d -> d.getArtifact().getGroupId());
194        Comparator<Dependency> byArtifactId = Comparator.comparing(d -> d.getArtifact().getArtifactId());
195        return dependencies.stream()
196                .sorted(byGroupId.thenComparing(byArtifactId))
197                .map(dependency -> dependency.getArtifact().getFile().getAbsolutePath())
198                .collect(Collectors.joining(File.pathSeparator));
199    }
200
201    /**
202     * Packages the project by invoking the Jar plugin.
203     *
204     * @return the invocation result.
205     */
206    public InvocationResult packageProject() throws MavenInvocationException {
207        return executorService.invokeGoal(MAVEN_JAR_PLUGIN, "jar");
208    }
209}
